statements: UPDATE research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies SET title = 'Effect of GM Foods on Allergies' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies SET researcher_name = 'Dr. Smith', findings = 'No significant impact of GM foods on allergies' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies SET title='Updated Title', researcher_name='John Doe' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies SET findings='The latest findings are very promising and show significant improvements in allergy management.', publication_date='2022-05-20' WHERE researcher_name='Alice Smith';
UPDATE ResearchFindings SET modification_type = 'Addition', findings = 'New findings added' WHERE research_id = 123;
UPDATE Researchers SET department = 'Biology', researcher_name = 'John Doe' WHERE researcher_id = 456;
UPDATE ResearchFindings SET findings = 'Updated findings for research 3' WHERE research_id = 3;
UPDATE Researchers SET email = 'newemail@gmail.com', department = 'Data Science' WHERE researcher_id = 1;
UPDATE research_findings SET research_title = 'New Findings Title', findings = 'Updated findings description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE genetic_modification SET impact_description = 'Improved nutritional content', modified_food = 'Modified Corn' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE research_findings SET research_title = 'Updated Research Title', findings = 'New Findings' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE food_allergies SET allergy_severity = 'Severe', allergy_triggers = 'Peanuts, Shellfish' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE research_studies SET researcher_name = 'John Doe' WHERE study_id = 1
UPDATE genetic_modifications SET modified_trait = 'Increased yield' WHERE modification_id = 3
UPDATE research_studies SET publication_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE study_id = 1
UPDATE research_results SET result_description = 'Positive impact on human health' WHERE result_id = 3
UPDATE research_studies SET study_title = 'New Study Title', research_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE study_id = 1;
UPDATE food_allergies SET allergen_name = 'Peanuts', allergic_reaction = 'Severe reaction observed' WHERE allergy_id = 3;
UPDATE research_studies SET study_description = 'New study description', researcher_name = 'John Doe' WHERE study_id = 1;
UPDATE food_allergies SET allergic_reaction = 'Severe reaction', allergy_type = 'Peanut allergy' WHERE allergy_id = 3;
